entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
